I would like to schedule a visit to both the main and e-commerce warehouses next Sunday morning. The purpose of the visit is to assess potential efficiency solutions in lighting and water usage within the warehouses part of FM/Sustainability taskforce ongoing project.

 

Looking forward to your confirmation.

 

Best regards,
